author: Staff Reporter
text:
Results of November semester examinations of UG and PG courses of Scott Christian College (Autonomous) here have been released on Monday and posted on college website www.scottchristian.org. A college release said that M.Phil. results would be published within a week.

Undergraduate students may apply for copies of answer scripts till January 11, and for recounting and revaluation till January 13.
title: Exam results published
